Title: Near-field THz time-domain spectroscopy of anisotropic dielectric micro-particles
Source: Int. Conf. Infrared, Millim., Terahertz Waves, IRMMW-THz
Abstract: © 2016 IEEE.Using the near-field time-domain terahertz spectroscopy, we detect the splitting of magnetic dipole resonance mode in strongly anisotropic mono-crystalline TiO2 micro-spheres. By fitting the Fano resonance model to the experimental data, we extract the intrinsic resonant properties of the micro-spheres and characterise their constituent dielectric material.
